name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Brian David PHILLIPS, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Brian David PHILLIPS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our decision in Commonwealth v. Albert, 563 Pa. 133, 758 A.2d 1149 (2000), the Order of the Allegheny County Common Pleas Court is reversed and the matter is remanded for further proceedings.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James R. Gilmore, Pittsburgh, for Commonwealth of PA.
Patrick J. Thomassey, Monroeville, for Brian Phillips.
casebody.head_matter:
764 A.2d 1055
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Brian David PHILLIPS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 13, 2000.
Decided Jan. 16, 2001.
James R. Gilmore, Pittsburgh, for Commonwealth of PA.
Patrick J. Thomassey, Monroeville, for Brian Phillips.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
